alert.note: Alert for Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 26 at 1:51PM MST until February 26 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING ABOVE 5500 FEET... * WHAT...Snow above 5500 feet. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Areas above 5500 feet near Alpine, Buffalo Pass, Chinle, Eagar-Springerville, Ganado, Kayenta, Pinetop- Lakeside, Saint Johns, Show Low and Window Rock. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Additional snow forecast from 1 PM Today to 6 PM Today: Alpine 0 to 1 inches Buffalo Pass 0 to 1 inches Chinle 0 to 1 inches Eagar-Sprgrvlle 0 to 1 inches Ganado 0 to 1 inches Kayenta 0 to 1 inches Pinetop-Lkside 0 to 1 inches Saint Johns 0 to 1 inches Show Low 0 to 1 inches Window Rock 0 to 1 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; White Mountains
